actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend for three years the requirement of increased payments to States under Medicaid plans for compensation or training of inspectors of long-term care institutions.

summary.text: Extends for three years the requirement of increased payments to States under medicaid plans for compensation or training of inspectors of long-term care institutions.

titles.title: A bill to extend for three years the requirement of increased payments to States under Medicaid plans for compensation or training of inspectors of long-term care institutions.
